website_summaries.verdict: The people who have tried on the Reebok Floatride Run Fast were generally happy with what they were able to experience. This road shoe apparently offered effective performances on the roads. The lightweight build and the soft midsole construction were also given praise by neutral pronators. On the other hand, there were gripes about the upper being unsecured and the outsole peeling off after some time.
pros: Several people reported that the Reebok Floatride Run Fast was obliging as a shoe for speed training
The lightweight construction of this running companion was lauded by many of its testers
The underfoot experience was soft yet responsive, some consumers stated
A handful of runners felt that the price of this road shoe was on par with the quality of its materials
it’s not too cheap, but it’s not hot on the wallet
The width and the sizing scheme were aspects of this product that were thought to adequately follow expectations
cons: A tester complained of in-shoe wobbling and unsteadiness while wearing the Reebok Floatride Run Fast
A few people observed some wear on the outsole after only about a hundred miles of using it
The yellow accents on the upper didn’t agree well with several of its purchasers

customer_reviews.title: good running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I had Reebok Floatriders but did not like plastic on sides, The Reebok Floatrider Race shoe is lighter , same forefoot heel comfort, correct size fit. It mat become one of my "race shoes" . I never thought I would say that about Reebok.
customer_reviews.author: Craig P

customer_reviews.title: Tread wear
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes but the tread/heel weres down very fast. This causes it to be very easy to wear down uneven do to a non-perfect gait, which then just makes your gait even worse as it will make it hard for you to try to correct it with the uneven heel. Mine are worn down almost all the way on the arch side of the shoe. This has never happened to such an extreme for me before.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Neumann

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite racing flats
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is one of my favorite flats. It's lightweight and seems to lean me forward when I'm hitting faster paces. I only use it for races and so far it's held up to ~70 miles with minimal signs of wear. When it eventually starts to wear, I'll roll this pair into my 'hard day' workout flats for sure and maybe try to find another pair for racing. I have worn it in every common race distance from 5k to marathon with no comfort issues.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Arch
customer_reviews.text: Arch just seems to push up into mid foot. Not for people with low arches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Go to running shoe
customer_reviews.text: These have been by go to running shoes since they were released. The men’s 10 weighs exactly 7oz(my Nike Vaporfly 4% also weigh 7oz), and for a shoe this lite it feels great. I rotate two pairs for outdoor runs and another older pair for the treadmill. The fit perfect, are comfortable and most importantly for me they are lite. Sometimes one will come untied but that’s may be once every 10 runs. Great shoe for long, short, slow or fast runs.
customer_reviews.author: Maxim

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Chinese Product falling apart at delivery
customer_reviews.text: Cheap CHINESE manufacturing. Theresa we're pulling lose inside the shoe before I ever put it on. Enough with the CHEAP CHINESE MANUFACTURING!!
customer_reviews.author: Warfyste

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and Fast
customer_reviews.text: I’m an avid runner, not a competitive one though. Haven’t really thought about running shoes being a factor until I started having ankle pain. I was looking for something with more padding to help take some of the stress of my joints. What I found was an extremely comfortable, supportive, lightweight shoe that has improved my pace. Shaved 15 seconds off my mile pace the first run out. Didn’t change paths or stride it was just an easier ride!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great fit,  super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and springy. I need support since i have high arches. I wear orthotics with these as a they feel amazing. Incredibly light. Im faster with these and looking forward to breaking my past times running
customer_reviews.author: Francis Williams

customer_reviews.title: Son loves these
customer_reviews.text: Debated between these and Saucony Kinvara 11. My son picked these and was very happy after an 8 mile run.
customer_reviews.author: James Lopez Ericksen

customer_reviews.title: Loved the shoe in every respect but one...
customer_reviews.text: These run narrow. Everything else was phenomenal, but I returned them due to the narrow fit.
customer_reviews.author: Badvhlad

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised, used as a training long run shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Applebee

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Very comfortable and light weight. I will probably buy these again when my current shoes wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Hans C Adams

customer_reviews.title: Best choice
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. After first run I’ve understood the name: FloatRide run fast. Shoes are great. Fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pair of running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. There are comfortable, light and stable. Very happy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Surfer12

customer_reviews.title: Not good shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've tried 3 times writing a review with pictures but they refuse to let me show everyone what was sent. They sent horrible shoes. Not the ones pictured in the image.
customer_reviews.author: Jason keniston

customer_reviews.title: Lack of durability
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe for someone who enjoys minimalist kicks...however their lack of durability leaves me disappointed. (Less than 4 months before structural damage to shoe)
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Fast & light
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and light. Good grip on the bottom of the shoe. Toe box is a little snug but overall it’s a great racer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super light but cushioned
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe so far. I ran 20 miles in them straight out of the box with no discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great cushioned heal support while running. Very light and fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Medina

customer_reviews.title: Great Running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. So light I hardly notice they’re there
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoes. Better than a new pair of brooks i bought.
customer_reviews.author: austin buckhalter

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable base
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is light as advertised but uncomfortable and blisters the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Sotsky

customer_reviews.title: Great fast trainer/racer
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the purchase. The FRF is very nimble, true to size (or slightly long), toe box is just right, the outsole is grippy, and the gait is very smooth. From the very first run I felt they were pushing me forward - very nice feeling. The durability is a concern. however I'm fine with that this pair is going to be my fast workouts/racer shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Evgeny Amelchenko

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but noisy on pavement.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. Looks good except fabric wrinkles near the toes. I decided to return because they were noisy when walking on pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe for a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice, lightweight, very nice traction and comfortable, have no idea what is the main difference with the pro version, but the difference in price seems hard to justify with such a great shoe (run fast version).
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

product_meta.title: Reebok mens Floatride Run Fast
feature_bullets: Materials: mesh engineered to create breathability
Best for: Long distance runs, including marathons, half marathons, 10Ks
Stabilizing EVA foam rim centers and balances your foot throughout gait cycle
Supportive 3D heel cradle is specially contoured to help eliminate heel irritation
Floatride Foam technology provides soft and lightweight cushioning for a responsive feel
